gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecurities` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecurities` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_BondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfBondsOtherFixedIncomeSecuritiesMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
